title: [Large-Scale] Customized Network-Based University Innovation Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational innovative thinking and digital literacy
context.additional_context: A course intensively developing innovation capabilities through project-based assessments in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement one weekly innovation project using a customized network system.
Learners strengthen collaborative competencies by conducting three or more peer feedback sessions via real-time discussion tools.
Propose five or more creative ideas for solving social issues in virtual reality simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
